frame.name: Vehicle_subpart
frame.definition: <def-root>An entity is integrated into a vehicle as a <fen>Part</fen> of a (possibly unexpressed) <fen>Whole</fen> which may refer to the whole vehicle or merely to a sub-part of the vehicle. <ex></ex> <ex>The <fex name="Whole">car's</fex> <fex name="Part"><t>engine</t></fex> started smoking so we pulled over.</ex> <ex>Put the bags in the <fex name="Part"><t>trunk</t></fex>.</ex> <ex>One should always wear a <fex name="Part"><t>seatbelt</t></fex> while driving.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Part
FE.definition: <def-root>Some <fex name="Part">Part</fex> of the larger vehicle, the <fex name="Whole">Whole</fex>. </def-root>

FE.name: Whole
FE.definition: <def-root>A vehicle (the <fex name="Whole">Whole</fex>) which includes the <fex name="Part">Part</fex>. </def-root>

FE.name: Function
FE.definition: <def-root>The function of the part within the vehicule as a whole. </def-root>

FE.name: Orientation
FE.definition: <def-root>This property of the part that situates the part within the whole. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: door.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a swinging barrier between the interior and exterior of a vehicule.

lexUnit.name: window.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: an opening in the wall of a vehicule that usually contains glass.

lexUnit.name: seat.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the interior location designed to seat passengers travelling in a vehicule.

lexUnit.name: seatbelt.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a belt used to secure someone into the seat of a vehcule.

lexUnit.name: tire.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the circular, air-inflated, and (usually) rubber component of the vehicule which permits the vehicule to touch the ground and move forward.

lexUnit.name: wheel.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the part of the vehicule which holds a tire.

lexUnit.name: brake.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a device that is used to slow down or stop a moving vehicule.

lexUnit.name: engine.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the component of the vehicule that provides the necessary power for the motion of the vehicule.

lexUnit.name: hood.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the hinged barrier at the front of a vehicule which serves to cover the engine compartment.

lexUnit.name: trunk.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a part of the vehicule, generally at the posterior end of the vehicule, which is commonly used as storage space. The trunk may be covered by a hinged barrier.

lexUnit.name: part.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a component of a vehicle that has a distinct function

lexUnit.name: windshield.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the a pane of glass at the front of a vehicle, used for blocking wind.
